column2: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch - Kiseki no Birthday Omake Flash
From the Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion - Kiseki no Birthday DVD/Blu-ray. It is different from the 9 Omake Flash specials included in the Code Geass R2 DVD/Blu-ray.
